The Cambridge Companions to Literature and Classics collection offers over 1400 comprehensive and accessible essays on major authors, periods and genres, written by experts and designed for student readers.

Library of Congress Online Catalog gir oversikt over bøker, serier, datafiler, manuscript, kart, musikk og lydopptak og visuelt materiale i biblioteket. ## ##The Library of Congress Online Catalog is a database of books, serials, computer files, manuscripts, cartographic materials, music, sound recordings, and visual materials at the library.

datafield.subfield: Referansar til forskningsartiklar innan medisin, tannmedisin og helsefag. Lenker til fulltekst, kan krevje abonnement. @@U http://www.ub.uib.no/felles/Brosjyrer/Pubmed.pdf@@DUBs brosjyre@@E## ##PubMed is a bibliographic database covering medicine, dentistry, and health sciences. Links to fulltext, may require a subscription. More info, see "Lenke til hjelpeside"
Author names are entered in the database in different formats. Therefore, searches on authors are done on the Last name and First initial only: Last, F?

program_name.line: my %stopw=qw(a 1 about 1 again 1 all 1 almost 1 also 1 although 1 always 1 among 1 an 1 and 1 another 1 any 1 are 1 as 1 at 1 be 1 because 1 been 1 before 1 being 1 between 1 both 1 but 1 by 1 can 1 could 1 did 1 do 1 does 1 done 1 due 1 during 1 each 1 either 1 enough 1 especially 1 etc 1 for 1 found 1 from 1 further 1 had 1 has 1 have 1 having 1 here 1 how 1 however 1 i 1 if 1 in 1 into 1 is 1 it 1 its 1 itself 1 just 1 kg 1 km 1 made 1 mainly 1 make 1 may 1 mg 1 might 1 ml 1 mm 1 most 1 mostly 1 must 1 nearly 1 neither 1 no 1 nor 1 obtained 1 of 1 often 1 on 1 our 1 overall 1 perhaps 1 pmid 1 quite 1 rather 1 really 1 regarding 1 seem 1 seen 1 several 1 should 1 show 1 showed 1 shown 1 shows 1 significantly 1 since 1 so 1 some 1 such 1 than 1 that 1 the 1 their 1 theirs 1 them 1 then 1 there 1 therefore 1 these 1 they 1 this 1 those 1 through 1 thus 1 to 1 upon 1 use 1 used 1 using 1 various 1 very 1 was 1 we 1 were 1 what 1 when 1 which 1 while 1 with 1 within 1 without 1 would 1 );

datafield.subfield: Online-tidsskrifter frå HighWire Press ## ##Search journals published by HighWire Press

YEAR, ISBN and ISSN searches are not supported. ## ##Searches in the subject are done on the title and abstract. ## ##Boolean NOT searches are not supported. ## ##Enter your search in one search box. Refining searches is not supported. ## ##Do not use truncation in a 'phrase' search. Truncation is only supported when one word is used as a search term.
27.7.2006 rkl##2011.09.26 lmi Endret til subscription og bruk proxy

program_name.line: # $self->{Find}->{nextPattern} = '';#get the 'next' navigation from the response via regex
# $self->{Find}->{failPattern} = '';#regex on response of failed logon - only special cases
# $self->{RequestParams}->{addToHeader}= {};# only if special lines must be added to http header
# $self->{CookieJar}->{IN_param1} etc are the session ids that can be replaced from the conf file
##If only one search term, search as "and" not "or"
while ( $response =~ m!<TD ROWSPAN="2" ALIGN="CENTER" VALIGN="TOP" WIDTH="61" NOWRAP>(.*?)<\/table>\s*<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" BORDER="0" WIDTH="120">!sg ) {
